Class UiUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.stefanbrenner.droplet.utils.UiUtils

public final class UiUtils
extends java.lang.Object

User interface utilities.

This class provides static utility methods for the ui.

Author:
Stefan Brenner

                                          int gridx,
                                          int gridy)
Updates a GridBagConstraints with the given parameter.
GridBagConstraints.weightx, GridBagConstraints.weighty and GridBagConstraints.anchor are set to there standard values.
